thread.title: Steve Hayes on Iran Stockpile: This is a “Legacy Project” for Obama
thread.title_full: Steve Hayes on Iran Stockpile: This is a “Legacy Project” for Obama

author: FOX News Talk
title: Steve Hayes on Iran Stockpile: This is a “Legacy Project” for Obama
text:
John Gibson Jun 3, 2015 
Steve Hayes, Columnist for “The Weekly Standard” and All Star Panel Member on “Special Report with Brett Baier,” chats with John about reports that international inspectors say Tehran’s stockpile of nuclear fuel increased about 20 percent over the last 18 months of negotiations. With only one month left before a deadline to complete a nuclear deal with Iran, Steve says the stockpile is a “legacy project” for Obama, and is concerned that the president’s administration has been “explaining away” Iran violations of their agreements.
